settings.text:
Welcome to The NFT Florist, a state-of-the-art gallery that provides a unique and immediate way to send stunning, yet very inexpensive NFT bouquets to your friends and family, or as a thank you to your customers. Are you planning to surprise someone with flowers this week? Instead, why not elevate your gift-giving game and send them a one-of-a-kind elegant original work of art for only $5 per NFT bouquet, by taking advantage of our one-time sign-up offer of 6 bouquets for ONLY $30. That's a $75 discount! You will also automatically become a Founding Member for FREE (FAQ link here ) and you will receive an important surprise benefit from the first minute, along with many more benefits in the future.
It's seamless and so easy anyone can do it—just click and we do the rest.

Choose from our impressive array of over (120) exquisite NFT bouquets, all limited-edition original digital art, expertly created by our talented artists. Unlike expensive flowers from traditional bouquet vendors, our NFT bouquets are environmentally responsible. We encourage you to join to fight the carbon footprint of the fresh-cut flower industry. Provided you replace the old usual standard flowers on occasion with the new, unusually beautiful, and collectible bouquets from the NFT Florist. Our flowers bloom forever, making them a warm and collectible-lasting gift.
Our bespoke NFT bouquets allow for an unparalleled level of customization, far beyond what is offered by expensive flower vendors. With the option to include a 750-character personal message and a 15-second personal voice message, you can create a truly unique and heartfelt gift. Choose from our vast selection of bouquets and personalize them for any occasion or recipient. Sending and receiving bouquets from The NFT Florist is instant, simple, easy, reliable, and hassle-free. Every NFT Florist bouquet may be downloaded directly from our website or via Bluetooth to your preferred device(s), and can be enjoyed as screensavers, displays, picture frames, and other Wifi and Bluetooth-enabled devices. As a limited-edition collectible, our NFT bouquets are a distinctive and heartwarming gift that will bring joy to your friends and loved ones. Take advantage of our exclusive one-time offer* and purchase 6 bouquets for just $30 and receive a FREE Founding Membership to both The NFT Florist and the world-class art magazine ArtRKL. That's right—the Free Founding Membership Signup Offer is only $5 for each of 6 beautiful NFT bouquets. Browse our exceptional collection of original digital art and immerse yourself in the beauty of original digital art fused with the sentiment of gift-giving.
